verses.name: Hebrews 8:1
verses.text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum: We have such an high priest, who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens;

verses.name: Hebrews 8:2
verses.text: A minister of the sanctuary, and of the true tabernacle, which the Lord pitched, and not man.

verses.name: Hebrews 8:3
verses.text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices: wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer.

verses.name: Hebrews 8:4
verses.text: For if he were on earth, he should not be a priest, seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law:
